channel.title: Nemesis V2.0+In development!
channel.description:
[b][i][u]Nemesis V2.0![/u][/i][/b]
Information about the server: Well, I originally started off with a P16 Blitz source, and turned it around, to completely unrecognizable by most people, but it just wasn't good enough. So I decided to try mixing sources, so I mixed WhiteScape and PimpScape up, and I came up with Nemesis::::Re-Written, with 150 updates, I started getting T2 errors when I tried logging in, so I decided to stop on it for a while. I got extremely bored, and decided to start on a new server, but this time, it's based off of only TestScape! The name of the server came from a song by Arch Enemy, called Nemesis, kind of self-explainable.
Updates: 1. Fixed Ranging speed, it's good now 2. Fixed arrows dropping and picking up arrows, also checks for arrows! 3. Fixed Range max hit, currently stands at 26, as I want it to be realistic 4. 100% Ranged FIXED! 5. Magic on NPC's 6. Magic on Players 7. Changed starting point to Lumbridge, use the portal to leave 8. Change it so when you log in, it says "Welcome "playername" to "servername" etc lol 9. Fixed the Mage bug in TestScape, where it kills you every time you cast a spell 10. Realistic max hits, max with whip is 45, and max with full dharok is 90 (99 str, potted, and prayer) 11. Added in a horrible version of the Duel Arena, I'll add more to it 12. Featuring 3 100% skills so far 13. Woodcutting-Credits to Sam_Server 14. Mining-Credits to Sam_Server 15. Fletching-Credits to LeScape PK, just missing broad arrows, and Fletch 'X' 16. 100% item.cfg 17. 100% item.java 18. Reduced a lot of lag 19. Client 20. Website 21. Client is mandatory! 22. Full Specials 23. Changed the hit bubble 24. Changed the HP bar 25. Took out ALL item commands 26. Took out all TELEPORTING commands 27. Delayed my custom specials, to prevent massing with them 28. Added in a Special Bar 29. Added a GFX strike to my specials 30. Fixed mass clicking with PKing and training 31. No more object training 32. No more shops, except for a couple, they are obsolete 33. Best store bought item is Black 34. Added in drops to nearly every NPC, because stores suck IMO
That's all of the updates I've had within the past two days, I've pretty much no-lifed this for a total of probably 30 hours in 2 days, so it might be delayed.
Website information: www.needapproval.notapprovedyet I'll be making a new SMFFORFREE forum, and probably shortening the domain to co.nr, so don't expect a huge cool website.
Credits Sam_Server-20% LeScape PK-10% Nvi Ible for TestScape-10% Rest is me, I feel I need to give credits to the people who posted/gave me good tutorials!
If you want to know how I got 100% Fletching, other than Fletch 'X', I got it from LeScape PK because he's a pimp. I'm also sending him my custom specials, so the deal is even.
Feel free to add me to MSN, with suggestions, post suggestion here, or PM me! Ways of contacting me for updated server information: MSN: craft229@hotmail.com Post Here PM Me

item.title: Nemesis V2.0+In development!
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

Nemesis V2.0!

Information about the server:
Well, I originally started off with a P16 Blitz source, and turned it around, to completely unrecognizable by most people, but it just wasn’t good enough. So I decided to try mixing sources, so I mixed WhiteScape and PimpScape up, and I came up with Nemesis::::Re-Written, with 150 updates, I started getting T2 errors when I tried logging in, so I decided to stop on it for a while. I got extremely bored, and decided to start on a new server, but this time, it’s based off of only TestScape! The name of the server came from a song by Arch Enemy, called Nemesis, kind of self-explainable.

Updates:

  1. Fixed Ranging speed, it’s good now
  2. Fixed arrows dropping and picking up arrows, also checks for arrows!
  3. Fixed Range max hit, currently stands at 26, as I want it to be realistic
  4. 100% Ranged FIXED!
  5. Magic on NPC’s
  6. Magic on Players
  7. Changed starting point to Lumbridge, use the portal to leave
  8. Change it so when you log in, it says "Welcome “playername” to “servername” etc lol
  9. Fixed the Mage bug in TestScape, where it kills you every time you cast a spell
  10. Realistic max hits, max with whip is 45, and max with full dharok is 90 (99 str, potted, and prayer)
  11. Added in a horrible version of the Duel Arena, I’ll add more to it
  12. Featuring 3 100% skills so far
  13. Woodcutting-Credits to Sam_Server
  14. Mining-Credits to Sam_Server
  15. Fletching-Credits to LeScape PK, just missing broad arrows, and Fletch ‘X’
  16. 100% item.cfg
  17. 100% item.java
  18. Reduced a lot of lag
  19. Client
  20. Website
  21. Client is mandatory!
  22. Full Specials
  23. Changed the hit bubble
  24. Changed the HP bar
  25. Took out ALL item commands
  26. Took out all TELEPORTING commands
  27. Delayed my custom specials, to prevent massing with them
  28. Added in a Special Bar
  29. Added a GFX strike to my specials
  30. Fixed mass clicking with PKing and training
  31. No more object training
  32. No more shops, except for a couple, they are obsolete
  33. Best store bought item is Black
  34. Added in drops to nearly every NPC, because stores suck IMO

That’s all of the updates I’ve had within the past two days, I’ve pretty much no-lifed this for a total of probably 30 hours in 2 days, so it might be delayed.

Website information:
www.needapproval.notapprovedyet
I’ll be making a new SMFFORFREE forum, and probably shortening the domain to co.nr, so don’t expect a huge cool website.

Credits
Sam_Server-20%
LeScape PK-10%
Nvi Ible for TestScape-10%
Rest is me, I feel I need to give credits to the people who posted/gave me good tutorials!

If you want to know how I got 100% Fletching, other than Fletch ‘X’, I got it from LeScape PK because he’s a pimp. I’m also sending him my custom specials, so the deal is even.

Feel free to add me to MSN, with suggestions, post suggestion here, or PM me!
Ways of contacting me for updated server information:
MSN: craft229@hotmail.com
